F

forcedVersion - Variable in class org.netbeans.nbm.repository.PopulateRepositoryMojo
When specified, will force all modules to have the designated version.

H

HelpMojo - Class in org.netbeans.nbm.repository
Display help information on nb-repository-plugin.
Call mvn nb-repository:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
HelpMojo() - Constructor for class org.netbeans.nbm.repository.HelpMojo
 

L

localRepository - Variable in class org.netbeans.nbm.repository.PopulateRepositoryMojo
Local maven repository.

N

netbeansInstallDirectory - Variable in class org.netbeans.nbm.repository.PopulateRepositoryMojo
Location of NetBeans installation
netbeansJavadocDirectory - Variable in class org.netbeans.nbm.repository.PopulateRepositoryMojo
If you want to install/deploy also NetBeans api javadocs, download the javadoc zip file from netbeans.org expand it to a directory, it should contain multiple zip files.
netbeansNbmDirectory - Variable in class org.netbeans.nbm.repository.PopulateRepositoryMojo
If defined, will match the nbm files found in the designated folder with the modules and upload the nbm file next to the module jar in local and remote repositories.
netbeansSourcesDirectory - Variable in class org.netbeans.nbm.repository.PopulateRepositoryMojo
Assumes a folder with <code-name-base>.zip files containing sources for modules.
